messages.subject: Unsubscribing
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you everyone - I am always learning! I have appreciated the mails and am implementing my learning as fast as I can. But I can t keep up with the volume
messages.messageBody:
Thank you everyone - I am always learning! I have appreciated the mails and
am implementing my learning as fast as I can. But I can't keep up with the
volume of mails here, read John Holt, look after my baby and assist our
family in its paradigm shift into unschooling - there just aren't enough
hours in my day. I hadn't had a chance to read for a week and to my dismay
found over 1000 mails waiting from you communicative lot!!! So, I've read as
fast as possible for 2 hours, and am now saying goodby for the time being.
No doubt I will be back one of these days - I am now completely convinced
about the validity of unschooling.
Blessings
Cathy
